name: Twisted Lands: Insomniac
description:
The Twisted Lands saga continues in the gripping sequel to the best-selling game!

TRY & BUY: UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE AND UPGRADE TO COLLECTOR'S EDITION FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

GAME FEATURES:
•58 locations
•Six HOG scenes
•29 mini-games
•Two difficulty modes
•Unlimited hints and tips

FIND US in FACEBOOK: AlawarEntertainment

In-apps can work incorrectly on OS 10.9
The issue will be fixed in a few days
